pages.text: $(li)The Cachalot Whale Tooth can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/echolocator)Echolocator$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)When a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/cachalot_whale)Cachalot Whale$(/l) attacks a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squid$(/l), it exists a chance to drop this item.
